title: Helmsman AI Instructions Update Analysis
details:
Completed comprehensive analysis of the Helmsman codebase and updated .github/copilot-instructions.md with AI coding guidance.

## Project Architecture Discovered:
- **Helmsman**: ADHD-optimized task management system with AI-powered features
- **Full-stack**: Next.js 14+ frontend, NestJS backend, PostgreSQL + Prisma ORM
- **Package Management**: Split approach - pnpm for root/frontend, npm for backend
- **State Management**: Zustand with devtools + persistence, React Query for server state
- **Real-time**: WebSocket + Yjs for collaborative document editing
- **AI Integration**: OpenAI GPT-4 for task extraction, classification, daily planning
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.2 AA compliant with extensive accessibility infrastructure

## ADHD-Specific Patterns:
- **Energy Levels**: LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH with color coding (GREEN/YELLOW/RED)
- **Focus Types**: CREATIVE/TECHNICAL/ADMINISTRATIVE/SOCIAL with emoji indicators
- **Task Sources**: MANUAL/AI_EXTRACTED/CALENDAR/EMAIL for context tracking
- **UI Optimization**: Reduced motion support, cognitive load minimization, predictable interactions

## Special Agent Workflows:
- **Codex Commands**: TaskMaster, CreatePrd, CreateTasks for automated project workflows
- **PRD Generation**: Structured process from feature request to task breakdown
- **Project Management**: .project-management/ directory with automated workflows

## Key File Locations:
- **Frontend Store**: frontend/src/store/ (Zustand patterns)
- **Backend Services**: backend/src/ with @Injectable services and @Controller patterns
- **Accessibility Components**: frontend/src/components/accessibility/ (comprehensive WCAG implementation)
- **AI Services**: backend/src/ai/ (OpenAI integration, task extraction)
- **Graph Integration**: backend/src/integrations/graph/ (Microsoft 365 sync)

## Development Workflow:
- **Startup**: ./dev_init.sh (Docker optional), ./run_tests.sh for full test suite
- **Ports**: Frontend (3000), Backend (8222), DB (5487), Storybook (6006)
- **Testing**: Vitest, Playwright, axe-core accessibility testing, Storybook test runner

## Updated AI Instructions Include:
- Agent-specific Codex environment commands
- Comprehensive code patterns for frontend/backend
- Accessibility-first testing strategies
- ADHD-optimized UI patterns
- Microsoft Graph integration patterns
- Performance optimization guidelines
- Real-time collaboration architecture

The updated instructions provide AI assistants with complete understanding of the ADHD-focused architecture, proper development workflows, and accessibility-first coding practices.
